title: BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies - Supreme Court Of Appeal Of South Africa Has Dismissed Cash Paymaster Services' Application
text:
BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies - Supreme Court Of Appeal Of South Africa Has Dismissed Cash Paymaster Services' Application

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 01, 2019 00:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies - Supreme Court Of Appeal Of South Africa Has Dismissed Cash Paymaster Services' Application Sept 30 (Reuters) - Net 1 UEPS Technologies Inc : * NET 1 UEPS TECHNOLOGIES INC - SUPREME COURT OF APPEAL OF SOUTH AFRICA HAS DISMISSED CASH PAYMASTER SERVICES (PTY) LTD ("CPS") APPLICATION * NET 1 UEPS TECHNOLOGIES INC - "WE ARE DISAPPOINTED WITH SCA JUDGMENT AND WILL STUDY JUDGMENT TO DETERMINE OUR NEXT COURSE OF ACTION," * NET 1 UEPS TECHNOLOGIES - SUPREME COURT RULING IS EXPECTED TO TEMPORARILY DELAY FILING OF CO'S FORM 10-K FOR YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2019

BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies - Supreme Court Of Appeal Of South Africa Has Dismissed Cash Paymaster Services' Application
description: BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies - Supreme Court Of Appeal Of South Africa Has Dismissed Cash Paymaster Services' Application
